item.title: Linux for 1:1 instead of Chromebooks or iPads
item.description:
(This post is basically me thinking out loud...)

Like many districts, my district is looking at devices for a 1:1 program. The top three devices seem to be Chromebooks, iPads, Windows or OS X laptops. Costs are the main driving factor for a lot of districts, which basically means …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Skills You Should Know (SYSK) - vi
item.description: I'm starting a new category, that goes along with my blog post Yes I will lead. The new category is called Skills You Should Know - SYSK. Little bits of information that through my experience aren't something that you may not necessarily use every day, but may someday save you a …
